name: AntiShoot
description:
Anti Shoots – REBOUND the balls!
Defeat the the enemies by their own shooting balls!!
Simply tap and hold paddles to rebound the balls and turn it back to the cannons.
Enjoy the bonus levels and mini games.

Key features:
- fantastic art style
- Fancy particles & effects
- Smoothly designed
- Bonus time with exciting mini games
- Cool gameplay
